package.name: BlastLuceneSearch
package.summary: Blast Lucene Search extension to improve Magento Search speed
package.description: This extension provides great add-on to magento search. All products are indexed using Lucene Search index (same as SoLR). Results are delivered more accuratelly and quicker!
